extendedInfo.description: This is a Theme specially designed forEASY KEYBOARD and will ""ONLY"" work with Easy KeyboardGet East Keyboardhttp://bit.ly/GetEasyKeyboardTo Apply the theme simply go to:Easy Keyboard Settings / Keyboard Themes / Select ThemeIt's That Simple!!"STOP PAYING FOR KEYBOARD SKINS"Easy Keyboard is the newest keyboard to hit the MarketIt has all the features of the leading keyboards plus a huge assortment of free skins to choose from. That is what sets Easy Keyboard Apart from the rest.If you Have any issues then please email usBad Comments Do Not Make Better Apps!! Good Customer Feedback Does!! Keep In TouchThis theme WILL NOT work for perfect keyboard smart keyboard  ultra keyboard or better keyboard.Easy-Keyboard-Themes
